bio: I'm an artist and a developer, i learn about web3 3 years a go, start from airdrop, investing then right know try to build app on web3.
contributionDescription: I will build a dapp for the optimism ecosystem, and build some nfts project, that's been my dream for a long time. because I have been following the optimism ecosystem for a long time so I want to explore and be part of optimism, i belive i can give more color to optimism.

contributionLinks.description: i will keep working on this and deploy on optimism, and add more features
